A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Star Wars film I'll ever bother going to theatres for. If you are not the sort of person who turns their brain off to enjoy movies\, you're probably not going to like this.\nA lukewarm sci-fi action movie. A big disappointment of a Star Wars movie.\nDon't waste your time or your money. If you really want to see this\, wait for video or take to the high seas.
